name: Garima Shergill!
greetingText: Wish you all the best yaa!
wishText: I know that you might be far but I know I am the closest thing to you, nothing can keep us apart for long ! Happy Birthday, meri LaBuBu! 💖
text1: tussi 22 de hoge, big girl doing big girl things!!! 🥹
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Wish you all the best, meri jaan! 🥳 🥳 🥳
text2: I was just about to chat with you...
text3: But I realized, I want to do more things
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are most valuable source of happiness for me 💖
outroText: I hope you liked it! see you soon after this! :D
replayText: I wish you to keep seeing this and replaying this for my endless love!
